items: Added video overlay support â€” upload a logo or image that appears over the video in the VOD Viewer and Clips pages.
Added an Overlay Placement Tool to drag and resize the overlay on a reference frame for precise positioning.
Improved VOD Viewer load speed by fetching only the selected VOD instead of loading the full VOD list.
Improved performance of VOD and clip list loading with media duration caching.
Added ability to download VOD's from Twitch
Reworked the Settings page with section-based navigation, autosave status feedback, and a cleaner workflow layout.
Added keyword management with per-keyword pre-roll/post-roll event windows for more precise clip timing.
Updated VOD bookmark and previous/next event seeking to apply keyword-specific event windows during jumps.
Added a first-time VOD setup guide to help new users scan and create clips faster.
Improved clip splitting reliability with safer FFmpeg encoding and clip validation.
Refined VOD navigation and setup flow for a smoother first launch experience.
VOD Viewer marker button now switches to Remove Marker when playback is within 10 seconds of a custom marker.
Clicking that button in range removes the nearest custom marker; otherwise it adds a new marker as before.
Improved in-app update experience with clearer status and smoother update checks.
Update notifications and patch note visibility are now more consistent across sessions.
